definition: A professional who provides guidance, support, and expertise to individuals in navigating and exploring mountainous terrains, ensuring their safety and facilitating their successful ascent and descent. This term is commonly used in the context of outdoor activities and mountaineering.

examples.german: Der Bergführer kennt die Berge wie seine Westentasche.
examples.english: The mountain guide knows the mountains like the back of his hand.

examples.german: Der Bergführer führte die Gruppe sicher zum Gipfel.
examples.english: The mountain guide led the group safely to the summit.

examples.german: Der Bergführer war ein erfahrener Kletterer.
examples.english: The mountain guide was an experienced climber.

examples.german: Der Bergführer gab den Wanderern hilfreiche Tipps.
examples.english: The mountain guide gave helpful tips to the hikers.

examples.german: Der Bergführer organisierte eine mehrtägige Bergtour.
examples.english: The mountain guide organized a multi-day mountain tour.
